name: Sport!
description:
Sport!

This game was created for the "Fuck This Jam" Game Jam by Full Bucket. We started this project June 5th at 1PM. Three people were worked on this game for 12 hours over the couse of 2 days.

Recommended Resolution for Sport is 1280 x 720.

Game Play:

Type the word that appears above the Pitcher in time with the rhythm of the Bat hitting the Ball in the lower right corner to earn points. Chain points together to earn bonus multipliers. Press escape to exit the game at any time.

Future:

We plan to continue fine tuning this game, constructive comments are welcome. We plan on adding other sports and possible modes of play.
